full_summary:
### Inspection, Testing, and Minor Repair Services for Mechanical and Electrical Systems

#### Project Description

The **Inspection, Testing, and Minor Repair (ITM) Services for Mechanical and Electrical Systems** Project (Project No: ES23SC1) is being issued by Defence Construction Canada (DCC). The project is located at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Leitrim, Masset, British Columbia.

#### Scope of Work

The successful Bidder will provide regular/frequent inspection services for various systems, primarily Mechanical and Electrical Systems, including:

* Transformers
* Generators
* UPS systems
* HVAC units
* Refrigeration units
* Plumbing systems
* General facilities infrastructure maintenance

The service contract will be for a period of 3 years from April 8, 2024, to April 7, 2027. The option to extend the contract for up to two additional 3-year periods is included, pending mutual agreement between the Contractor and DCC.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation criteria will be based on the established criteria outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP).

#### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: February 21, 2024, at 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 8, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: April 7, 2027

#### Bidding Requirements

Eligible bidders must submit their bids through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the closing date. The estimated value of the contract is approximately $1,800,000.

#### Contracting Entity

* Defence Construction Canada (DCC)

#### Contact Information

* Andrew Webster
* andrew.webster@dcc-cdc.gc.ca
* 613-949-7930

#### Additional Resources

* Bidding and documents are available on the MERX website.
* Fees may apply; please refer to the MERX pricing page for more information.---
